heading: HR00850
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH AND THE DEFEAT COVID-19 AD HOC COMMITTEE, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE HIGH INCIDENCE OF INFECTION AND DEATHS DUE TO COVID-19 AMONG FRONTLINE-HEALTH WORKERS, AND RECOMMEND URGENT MEASURES TO PROTECT AND SUPPORT THE HEALTH WORKERS

status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-27
